posts.post_content: Who the hell thought "yeah, this is a balanced card" in development? It eliminates the major playing point of Magic, the Mana cost. You don't even have to worry about getting your land drops if you play a creature-heavy deck, and considering that it makes your creatures all have Flash and "Cannot be countered", this weird artifact winds up being Green's best friend. Making the Neurok holding it a bit odd.
